api_list.api_description: Returns basic data about a character.
Returns a list of words matching given constraints.

optional_parameters.name: v
optional_parameters.description: Vocab identifier, e.g., 'enwiki' for English Wikipedia.

optional_parameters.name: topics
optional_parameters.description: Hints about the context or topic.

query: What is the meaning and basic details of the Chinese character I saw in an artile earlier? Also, give me words that mean the same as 'love' using an English vocabulary.

api_list.api_description: Returns basic data about a character.
Checks if input text contains profanity.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Input text to be checked for profanity.

query: What is the basic data of the Chinese character '仁'? Also, does the sentence my friend just said contain any profanity?

api_list.api_description: Returns basic data about a character.
Returns a list of words matching given constraints.

optional_parameters.name: v

optional_parameters.name: topics
optional_parameters.description: Hints about the context or topic.

query: What is the meaning and basic details of the Chinese character I saw in an artile earlier? Also, give me words that mean the same as the one my mom always talks about using an English vocabulary.
